description:
Ninja Alia Arrives!: Chevy and her friends were going to the flower fields to have a picnic until they had a strange encounter with Alia, an Apple flavored cat Zooble who studies in the way of the Ninja. She stole the three Zoobles` picnic and they must outsmart her to get their food back. But then Alia got stuck in a tree while chasing her and they must find a way to get her down.
Chevy`s Birthday: Today is Chevy`s Birthday and she is pretty excited for her party as she went to Coron`s house to see the cake. But strangely, her friends were ignoring her today. Later on in the beach, she met Ninya, a Watermelon flavored octopus Zooble and was invited to meet Coco, a Cola flavored fish zooble. The three of them played together, not knowing to them that Chevy is feeling lonely without her real friends during her birthday.

titles.title: Ninja Aria de Gozaru! / Chevy no Birthday
忍者アリアでござる! / チェビーのバースデー
